This is the '''Csp formfield/date''' template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Csp formfield/date
|name= (text) 
|required= (optional: "required")
|value= (date with format yyyy-mm-dd) e.g. "2023-04-15"
}}
</pre>

== Example ==
{{Csp formfield/date
|name=Release date
|value=2023-05-31
}}
